awakenings.effect: After ultimate skill heals friendly units, additionally make the target take 5% reduced damage, lasts 5 seconds
When self health drops below 20% after taking damage, immediately restore health equal to self attack power 750%, can trigger at most once per battle
[Skills] and [Normal Attack] level and level cap +4
Auto Skills healing friendly units can also trigger Awakening 1 effect. Awakening 1 effect is increased by 100% (It become 10%)

effects: Healing amount increases by 30%. When healing targets below 50% maximum health, they get 8% reduced damage, lasts 10 seconds
memoryCard.name: Solitary Realm (一人之境)

auto.description: Heal the friendly unit with the lowest current health percentage once, restore health equal to self attack power 69% + 335
auto.name: Sacred Healing

normal.description: Deals 120% attack power as Holy damage to designated enemy unit
normal.name: Divine Strike

passive.description: When healing friendly units whose current health is below 50%, healing amount increases by 24%
passive.name: Master of All (万事通之力)

ultimate.description: Heal the friendly unit with the lowest current health percentage once, restore health equal to self attack power 128% + 682
ultimate.name: Divine Intervention

teamSkill.description: Self attack power increases by 10%, healing amount increases by 12.5%
teamSkill.name: Divine Sanctuary
